mapper.select: SELECT SPRADM_ID , SPRADM_LGN_ID , SPRADM_LGN_PW , SPRADM_LGN_SLT , SPRADM_NM , SPRADM_PN , SPRADM_EMAIL , SPRADM_BRT_DT , SPRADM_ADRS , SPRADM_RGST_DT , SPRADM_UPDT_DT , SPRADM_DEL_DT , SPRADM_DEL_YN , INSTTN_ID , CMCD_ID , SPRADM_LGN_IP , SPRADM_LST_PW_MDFY_DT , SPRADM_LST_LGN_DT , SPRADM_LST_LGN_FAIL_DT , SPRADM_LGN_FAIL_CNT , SPRADM_LGN_YN , SPRADM_BLK_YN FROM SPRADM WHERE SPRADM_LGN_ID = #{_parameter}
mapper.update: UPDATE SPRADM SET SPRADM_LST_LGN_FAIL_DT = SYSDATE , SPRADM_LGN_FAIL_CNT= SPRADM_LGN_FAIL_CNT + 1 WHERE SPRADM_LGN_ID = #{_parameter}
UPDATE SPRADM SET SPRADM_BLK_YN = 'Y' WHERE SPRADM_LGN_ID = #{_parameter} AND SPRADM_LGN_FAIL_CNT >= 5
UPDATE SPRADM SET SPRADM_LGN_FAIL_CNT = 0 , SPRADM_LST_LGN_DT = SYSDATE , SPRADM_LGN_IP = NULL , SPRADM_LGN_YN = 'Y' WHERE SPRADM_LGN_ID = #{_parameter}
UPDATE SPRADM SET INSTR_DEL_YN = 'Y', SPRADM_DEL_DT = SYSDATE WHERE SPRADM_LGN_ID = #{_parameter}
